procedures.businessPurpose: Primary FNP elog bulk import SP for migrating FNP student clinical log records from legacy or external systems into the MyEvaluations platform.
optimizationRecommendations: WHILE loop used for row-by-row processing; refactor to set-based INSERT/UPDATE statements to eliminate row-by-row overhead
FOR XML PATH used for string concatenation; in SQL 2017+ prefer STRING_AGG for cleaner, more performant string aggregation

procedures.name: ImportFNPElogNotes
procedures.summary: Imports notes for standard FNP elog records from a staging import source.
procedures.businessPurpose: Supplemental import SP migrating clinical log note text for FNP standard encounter records during historical data migration.
optimizationRecommendations: WHILE loop used for row-by-row processing; refactor to set-based INSERT/UPDATE statements to eliminate row-by-row overhead

procedures.name: ImportFNPStudentFailedData
procedures.summary: Imports records of FNP students who failed to meet program requirements, flagging accounts in the system using a WHILE loop.
procedures.businessPurpose: Data migration SP for importing historical student failure records from external academic systems to maintain program completion accuracy in MyEvaluations.
optimizationRecommendations: WHILE loop used for row-by-row processing; refactor to set-based INSERT/UPDATE statements to eliminate row-by-row overhead

procedures.name: InsertActSchedulerSettings
procedures.summary: Inserts or updates ACT scheduler configuration settings for automated tasks.
procedures.businessPurpose: Allows administrators to configure the parameters controlling when and how ACT module automated schedulers (email, assignment) execute.

procedures.name: InsertBSNCLCComments
procedures.summary: Inserts coordinator or faculty comment records on a BSN CLC form submission.
procedures.businessPurpose: Enables faculty and coordinators to add review comments to student CLC form submissions for feedback and documentation purposes.

procedures.name: InsertBSNExcusedDateRanges
procedures.summary: Inserts excused date range records for BSN students or clinical sites, exempting them from log requirements during specified periods.
procedures.businessPurpose: Manages excused absence periods in the BSN log tracking system, preventing students from being flagged as non-compliant during authorized absences.

procedures.name: InsertBSNLinkEvaluationtoCoursesData
procedures.summary: Creates a linkage between an evaluation template and a BSN course for automated evaluation assignment.
procedures.businessPurpose: Configuration SP that binds evaluation templates to BSN courses, driving the automatic evaluation assignment engine for the BSN program.

procedures.name: InsertBSNLinkEvaluationtoSiteData
procedures.summary: Creates a linkage between an evaluation template and a BSN clinical site.
procedures.businessPurpose: Binds evaluation templates to specific clinical sites in the BSN program, enabling site-specific evaluation assignment rules.

procedures.name: InsertClinicalLogReportDownloadRequest
procedures.summary: Inserts a new report download request record for asynchronous clinical log report generation.
procedures.businessPurpose: Queues a clinical log export request for background processing, allowing coordinators to request large reports without waiting for synchronous generation.

procedures.name: InsertCourseCampusUsers
procedures.summary: Inserts user-campus-course association records for BSN course campus management.
procedures.businessPurpose: Associates users (students or faculty) with campus locations for BSN course sections, enabling campus-filtered views and access control.

procedures.name: InsertLinkEvaluationtoCoursesData
procedures.summary: Creates evaluation-to-course linkage records for ACT or FNP programs.
procedures.businessPurpose: General-purpose evaluation template binding SP for non-BSN programs, driving course-based automatic evaluation assignment.

procedures.name: IsGradingEvaluation
procedures.summary: Returns a flag indicating whether a given evaluation template is configured as a grading evaluation.
procedures.businessPurpose: Business rule check used to determine whether an evaluation submission should contribute to a student's grade calculation.
optimizationRecommendations: Add SET NOCOUNT ON to suppress row-count messages and reduce network overhead

procedures.name: MergeFNPPreceptors
procedures.summary: Merges two FNP preceptor records (source into target), transferring all data associations and deactivating the source record.
procedures.businessPurpose: Data quality operation used when duplicate preceptor accounts are identified, consolidating their clinical log associations, course assignments, and evaluation records.
optimizationRecommendations: Add SET NOCOUNT ON to suppress row-count messages and reduce network overhead

procedures.name: ReviewBSNCLCDocument
procedures.summary: Records a faculty or coordinator review action (approve/reject) on a BSN CLC document submission.
procedures.businessPurpose: Supports the BSN CLC document review workflow by recording faculty approval or rejection decisions on student-submitted clinical documentation.

procedures.name: SaveACTAlternativeEncounterLog
procedures.summary: Saves a new ACT alternative encounter log record (non-standard clinical encounter) with full field data and audit trail.
procedures.businessPurpose: Records alternative clinical encounters that do not fit standard FNP log templates, expanding log coverage for diverse clinical experiences.

procedures.name: SaveActCourseMappingData
procedures.summary: Saves or updates course mapping data linking ACT courses to external system course codes.
procedures.businessPurpose: Maintains the mapping between internal ACT course records and external institution course codes for data import and Salesforce integration.

procedures.name: SaveBehaviourSettings
procedures.summary: Saves or updates clinical behavior assessment settings for a course.
procedures.businessPurpose: Allows coordinators to configure which behavior categories are included in clinical evaluations for a specific course.

procedures.name: SaveBSNCLCDocuments
procedures.summary: Saves BSN CLC supporting document metadata records for a student's CLC form submission.
procedures.businessPurpose: Persists document attachment records when students upload supporting files to their BSN CLC form submissions.

procedures.name: SaveBSNCLCFormFields
procedures.summary: Saves BSN CLC form field configuration data for a form definition.
procedures.businessPurpose: Allows BSN administrators to configure the fields and validation rules for CLC forms presented to students.

procedures.name: SaveBSNPreceptorCommitmentAssignmentDetails
procedures.summary: Saves preceptor commitment and assignment detail records for BSN clinical placement.
procedures.businessPurpose: Records the formal commitment of a BSN preceptor to supervise a student for a clinical placement period, used in scheduling and compliance tracking.

procedures.name: SaveBSNReturnForm
procedures.summary: Saves BSN return demonstration form field values submitted by a student.
procedures.businessPurpose: Persists the student's answers on a BSN return demonstration form for faculty review and skills competency documentation.

procedures.name: SaveBSNStudentCLCForm
procedures.summary: Saves a BSN student's CLC form submission data including all field responses.
procedures.businessPurpose: Core data persistence SP for BSN CLC student submissions, recording clinical learning center activity documentation for faculty review.

procedures.name: SaveBSNStudentReturnDemonstrationForm
procedures.summary: Saves a student's BSN return demonstration form with attempt tracking, preceptor assignment, and audit trail events.
procedures.businessPurpose: Core SP for the BSN Return Demonstration workflow that records student skill demonstration submissions, tracks attempt counts, and fires the appropriate audit events.
optimizationRecommendations: Multiple temp tables used; consider indexed temp tables or table variables with appropriate statistics for large intermediate result sets

procedures.name: SaveClinicalData
procedures.summary: Saves clinical log data for ACT/DNP programs, inserting a new log record or updating an existing one.
procedures.businessPurpose: General-purpose clinical data persistence SP for non-FNP ACT program tracks, recording student clinical encounter data.

procedures.name: SaveCourse
procedures.summary: Inserts or updates an ACT course record including all metadata fields.
procedures.businessPurpose: Core course management persistence SP for creating and editing course records in the ACT module.
optimizationRecommendations: Add SET NOCOUNT ON to suppress row-count messages and reduce network overhead

procedures.name: SaveFNPAlternativeEncounterLog
procedures.summary: Saves an FNP alternative encounter log entry with full field data and audit trail events.
procedures.businessPurpose: Records FNP alternative clinical encounters (e.g., telehealth or non-standard visits) in the log system for hour tracking and faculty review.

procedures.name: SaveFNPClinicalData
procedures.summary: Saves or updates an FNP clinical log entry with full SOAP-style clinical data, calculates session context, and fires comprehensive audit events via TRY/CATCH.
procedures.businessPurpose: The primary FNP clinical log data persistence SP that records all clinical encounter details submitted by FNP students, driving the core hour tracking and evaluation workflows.

procedures.name: SendBSNPastDueNotifications
procedures.summary: Generates and queues past-due notification emails for BSN students with overdue clinical documentation obligations.
procedures.businessPurpose: Automated compliance notification that alerts BSN students and coordinators when clinical log or evaluation deadlines have passed without completion.
optimizationRecommendations: ROW_NUMBER() window function used for pagination; ensure underlying query columns are covered by appropriate indexes to avoid large sort operations

procedures.name: SendDashboardReminders
procedures.summary: Sends dashboard reminder emails to students and faculty with pending items, iterating over recipients using a WHILE loop.
procedures.businessPurpose: Scheduler-driven notification SP that sends reminder emails to all users with outstanding log or evaluation obligations surfaced on their dashboards.
optimizationRecommendations: WHILE loop used for row-by-row processing; refactor to set-based INSERT/UPDATE statements to eliminate row-by-row overhead

procedures.name: SendFNPClinicalLogsReminderEmail

procedures.name: SendImmersionNotificationsEvaluationCompleted
procedures.summary: Sends notifications to Immersion program participants when an evaluation is completed, iterating over recipients using a WHILE loop.
procedures.businessPurpose: Automated notification SP for the Immersion program track that alerts students and coordinators when evaluation submissions are finalized.
optimizationRecommendations: WHILE loop used for row-by-row processing; refactor to set-based INSERT/UPDATE statements to eliminate row-by-row overhead

procedures.name: SendPercentageOfPracticumHoursForStudent
procedures.summary: Calculates and sends practicum hour completion percentage notifications to individual students using a WHILE loop over eligible recipients.
procedures.businessPurpose: Progress notification SP that informs FNP/ACT students of their current practicum hour completion percentage, supporting student self-monitoring.
optimizationRecommendations: WHILE loop used for row-by-row processing; refactor to set-based INSERT/UPDATE statements to eliminate row-by-row overhead

procedures.name: SendPIPReEvaluationReminder
procedures.summary: Sends re-evaluation reminder emails to students and coordinators for active PIPs where the re-evaluation deadline is approaching.
procedures.businessPurpose: PIP workflow notification that ensures students and faculty are alerted when a Clinical Performance Improvement Plan re-evaluation deadline is imminent.
optimizationRecommendations: WHILE loop used for row-by-row processing; refactor to set-based INSERT/UPDATE statements to eliminate row-by-row overhead

procedures.name: UndoBSNCLCAssignment
procedures.summary: Reverses a BSN CLC assignment, removing the obligation from the student's queue and restoring the pre-assignment state.
procedures.businessPurpose: Correction workflow SP allowing coordinators to undo a CLC form assignment that was applied in error before the student completes it.

procedures.name: UndoBSNRDAssignment
procedures.summary: Reverses a BSN Return Demonstration assignment, removing the form obligation from the student.
procedures.businessPurpose: Correction workflow SP for undoing an RD assignment before the student completes the form, supporting coordinator error recovery.

procedures.name: UndoFNPCaseLogs
procedures.summary: Reverses all FNP case log entries for a student in a course, restoring the logs to draft or deleted state.
procedures.businessPurpose: Administrative correction operation allowing coordinators to reverse a bulk log submission or import that contained errors, resetting the student's log record.

procedures.name: UpdateACTAlternativeEncounterLog
procedures.summary: Updates an existing ACT alternative encounter log record and fires the appropriate audit trail events.
procedures.businessPurpose: Allows coordinators or students to modify a previously submitted ACT alternative encounter log entry, with full change logging.

procedures.name: UpdateACTStudentDetailLog
procedures.summary: Updates a single ACT student activity log record's detail fields.
procedures.businessPurpose: Provides the update operation for individual ACT student log entries, used when faculty or coordinators request corrections to submitted data.

procedures.name: UpdateACTStudentDetailLogs
procedures.summary: Batch-updates multiple ACT student detail log records.
procedures.businessPurpose: Allows coordinators to apply bulk updates to ACT student log entries, used in batch correction workflows.

procedures.name: UpdateClinicalData
procedures.summary: Updates an existing FNP or ACT clinical log record with corrected field data and fires audit events.
procedures.businessPurpose: Core clinical log update SP that modifies previously submitted clinical encounter records when students or coordinators need to correct entries.

procedures.name: UpdateClinicalPerformanceImprovement
procedures.summary: Updates a Clinical Performance Improvement Plan record with revised status, comments, or evaluation results.
procedures.businessPurpose: Supports the PIP lifecycle management workflow by allowing coordinators to update PIP records as students progress through the improvement plan.

procedures.name: UpdateDNPSalesForceFailedData
procedures.summary: Updates DNP student records that failed to sync to Salesforce, flagging them for retry.
procedures.businessPurpose: Error recovery operation for the DNP-Salesforce integration pipeline that marks failed export records for re-processing.
optimizationRecommendations: FOR XML PATH used for string concatenation; in SQL 2017+ prefer STRING_AGG for cleaner, more performant string aggregation

procedures.name: UpdateDNPStudentAcitivityLog
procedures.summary: Updates a DNP student activity log entry and fires an audit event.
procedures.businessPurpose: Provides the update operation for DNP student activity log entries in the ACT module.
optimizationRecommendations: ROW_NUMBER() window function used for pagination; ensure underlying query columns are covered by appropriate indexes to avoid large sort operations

procedures.name: UpdateDuplicateCourseInfo
procedures.summary: Identifies and updates duplicate course records using a WHILE loop, merging or flagging redundant course entries.
procedures.businessPurpose: Data quality maintenance operation that resolves duplicate course records created through import or manual entry errors.

procedures.businessPurpose: Allows coordinators to modify active PIP assignment parameters in bulk when program policy changes require updates to existing improvement plans.
optimizationRecommendations: WHILE loop used for row-by-row processing; refactor to set-based INSERT/UPDATE statements to eliminate row-by-row overhead
ROW_NUMBER() window function used for pagination; ensure underlying query columns are covered by appropriate indexes to avoid large sort operations

procedures.name: UpdateFNPAlternativeEncounterLog
procedures.summary: Updates an existing FNP alternative encounter log entry with corrected field data and audit trail.
procedures.businessPurpose: Provides the update operation for FNP alternative encounter log entries, allowing correction of submitted alternative clinical encounter records.

procedures.name: UpdateFNPCacheTables
procedures.summary: Rebuilds FNP clinical log cache tables by recalculating aggregated hour totals from underlying log records into denormalized cache tables.
procedures.businessPurpose: Performance optimization SP that refreshes denormalized cache tables used by FNP reporting queries to avoid expensive real-time aggregations on large log datasets.

procedures.name: UpdateFNPCacheTables1
procedures.summary: Alternate or second stage of the FNP cache table rebuild process.
procedures.businessPurpose: Handles additional cache table updates or a separate cohort of cache data as part of the FNP performance cache refresh pipeline.

procedures.name: UpdateFNPClinicalLogStatus
procedures.summary: Updates the status (e.g., pending, approved, rejected) of FNP clinical log records using temp tables for batch identification.
procedures.businessPurpose: Enables faculty and coordinators to change the review status of FNP clinical logs in bulk or individually, driving the log review workflow state machine.
optimizationRecommendations: WHILE loop used for row-by-row processing; refactor to set-based INSERT/UPDATE statements to eliminate row-by-row overhead

procedures.name: UpdateFNPSalesForceFailedData
procedures.summary: Updates FNP student records that failed Salesforce export, resetting their sync status for retry.
procedures.businessPurpose: Error recovery SP for the FNP-Salesforce integration pipeline that flags failed sync records for re-processing.

procedures.name: UpdateFNPWrongData
procedures.summary: Corrects known data integrity issues in FNP clinical log records, applying targeted fixes for identified bad data patterns.
procedures.businessPurpose: One-time or periodic data correction SP for resolving specific data quality issues found in FNP log records.
optimizationRecommendations: ROW_NUMBER() window function used for pagination; ensure underlying query columns are covered by appropriate indexes to avoid large sort operations

procedures.name: UpdateImmersionFacultyAccountID
procedures.summary: Updates the faculty account ID linkage for Immersion program participants.
procedures.businessPurpose: Administrative data correction SP for the Immersion program when faculty account IDs change or need to be relinked.
optimizationRecommendations: Add SET NOCOUNT ON to suppress row-count messages and reduce network overhead

procedures.summary: Updates session configuration data including dates, settings, and related metadata using a WHILE loop for related record updates.
procedures.businessPurpose: Core session management persistence SP allowing coordinators to edit academic session parameters including start/end dates and clinical placement settings.

procedures.name: UpdateReturnDemonstrationFormActions
procedures.summary: Updates action records (approve/reject/send-back) on a BSN Return Demonstration form submission.
procedures.businessPurpose: Records faculty review actions on BSN return demonstration submissions, advancing the form through the skills assessment approval workflow.

procedures.name: UpdateSessionDates
procedures.summary: Updates session start and end dates and propagates changes to related course session records.
procedures.businessPurpose: Administrative date correction SP for adjusting session scheduling when academic calendar changes affect clinical placement windows.
optimizationRecommendations: Add SET NOCOUNT ON to suppress row-count messages and reduce network overhead

procedures.name: UpdateStudentDetailLog
procedures.summary: Updates detail fields on a student activity log record.
procedures.businessPurpose: Provides an update path for student log detail corrections requested by faculty or coordinators during the log review process.

procedures.name: VerifyBSNMidtermEvaluations
procedures.summary: Verifies that BSN midterm evaluation assignments have been completed for all eligible students and flags any gaps.
procedures.businessPurpose: Quality assurance SP used by coordinators to confirm midterm evaluation compliance across all BSN students before the midpoint deadline passes.

procedures.name: VerifyMidtermEvaluations
procedures.summary: Verifies midterm evaluation completion status across ACT program students and returns a list of non-compliant records.
procedures.businessPurpose: General evaluation compliance check SP used by coordinators and administrators to ensure all students have received and completed their midterm evaluations on schedule.
